page.title: 04AGE OF TECHNOLOGY
page.content: Life/styles are increasingly being invaded by computers. They put people out of work because they do the job better. There are various languages for computers such as BASIC (beginners all symbolic instruction code),Fourth, Pascal,Logo and Hexadecimal. We have colour television and watch it a lot. Images are still produced via electron beams which are fired at the screen.There are three electron beams of different colours: red,green and blue. We have thought a lot about cloning and the prospects it may bring around in the future.We have already cloned rabbits and other animals but never people but we may be able to clone animals that are already extinct.
